title: 'Bhangi, Neech, Bhikhari, Mangani' not caste names: Rajasthan High Court drops SC/ST Act case
selftext: From my personal experiences I have seen these words being used to demean the lower castes, yo remind them where do they "belong".
comments: Dude we use these words amongst ourselves as jokes, chill
